name: WizBoard
description:
Hi everyone in our Super Secret game!

In this game you must protect your castle from Golems, Trolls and Witches 
You can move the super mysterious to lelft and right wizard
using A and D buttons

The super mysterious wizard can use 3 elements to kill the enemies

Each element can kill a certain enemy. It’s very simple.
Fire - Orange Golems and Trolls,

Earth - Green Golems and Trolls,

Air - Blue Golems and Trolls

But that is not all. You will surely meet stronger enemies - witches. To kill them, you need to combine two elements. And attack with a stronger projectile.

To select one element, double-click on it with the left mouse button. To make a combination, click on 2 elements one time at a time.

To Restart the game press R button

To Pause game press Esc button

Enjoy the Mysterious and Super Secret game!
